title: How to improve my English speaking and writing skills quickly - Quora

response.answer_text: Speaking and writing is about outputting information. In order to deliver information fluently, first thing first, you should have profound inputs, from listening and reading. So, my advice is that you should spend time listening and reading to improve knowledge, vocabulary, sentence and paragraph patterns in English, then imitate those patterns day by day, small step at a time. Try to use variety of patterns in your speech and writing to speed up your mind about thinking in English. Practice makes perfects. Repeat that routine frequently and you will find one day how well your English is improved in Speaking and Writing skills.

In fact, it could not be quickly….All you can do is to practice. But eading some guiding books and other writers’ books which you like can help you a lot. Reading and writing-the only way BTW, if you are lucky enough and live in a Englisch-speaking country, it’s good to improve your ability of obeserving the society, others’ lives, people around you.
